blocks.name: smonoord
blocks.content: Ordering relation for a strictly monotonic sequence, increasing case. Analogous to ~ monoord (except that the case ` M = N ` must be excluded). Duplicate of ~ monoords ? (Contributed by AV, 12-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm smonoord(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(c2, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  eluzfz2(c2, co(c1, caddc, nat1))
  mpcom(w0, wi(wcel(c2, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, c2))), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  uzind4(hs0, hs1, c2, co(c1, caddc, nat1), wi(w0, wi(wcel(c2, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, c2)))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), co(c1, caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2))
  breq2d(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), co(c1, caddc, nat1), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs1), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))

  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))))

  fveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wi(wcel(c2, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfz, c2)), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, c2))))

  sylc(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), clt, cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c1, co(c1, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1))), wral(s0, co(c1, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), clt, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, co(c1, cfz, co(c2, cmin, nat1))), wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  eluzp1m1(c1, c2)
  eluzfz1(co(c2, cmin, nat1), c1)

  fvoveq1(cv(s0), c1, c0, caddc, nat1)
